location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Duplicate letter no.1785 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Acting Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the despatch to Bombay of the Honourable Company’s Brigantine Tigrisfor refitting. Anderson informs Kemball of the intended return of the Tigrisback to the Persian Gulf once refitting has been completed. Enclosed with Anderson’s letter is letter no.286 of 1854 from Captain Sir Henry Leeke, Commodore and Commander in Chief of the Indian Navy, to The Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council in Bombay, dated 19 April 1854, in which it is confirmed that the Tigriswill return to the Persian Gulf on 22 April 1854.
